translations: [化工]化妆品（cosmetic 的复数）；装饰品
用化妆品打扮（cosmetic 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: The cosmetics industry uses gorgeous women to sell its skincare products.
sentences.translation: 化妆品行业用很性感的女人来推销护肤品。

sentences.sentence: Cosmetics do not cover up the deficiencies of nature.
sentences.translation: 化妆品并不能掩盖先天缺陷。
